spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly consistent with the 2D plan. The transition between the foyer and the kitchen/living area is accurately scaled. However, the sliding door to the larger deck (top) is slightly wider than the plan indicates, and the toilet in the master bedroom has suffered minor orientation distortion.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent structural fidelity. No text labels or UI elements present. The floating model correctly sits on a dark neutral background with all exterior and interior walls visible. No rooms were missed or hallucinated.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture corresponds near-perfectly to the floor plan. The dining table, kitchen counter, and bedroom sets are correctly placed. The sofa orientation and rug placement in the living room are accurate. Minor point deduction for the missing plant element near the TV unit.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent low-poly, flat-shaded aesthetic. The style avoids photorealism and textures as required. The orthographic isometric camera angle is precise and centered.

detected_errors.description: Missing decorative greenery (plants) in the living room and secondary deck shown in the 2D plan.
Slight proportion distortion of the window/sliding door leading to the upper deck.
